resources.string: If you want to network with the community, use other services on the app, chat, make free audio and video calls, join as Personal User
If you are any kind of service provider and want to sell your services to the community, join as Business User
If you are a merchant, a shop,a restaurant or any establishment and wants to sell your goods and services to the community, join as Merchant User
By logging in, you agree with our
